column4: I have a problem and I'm stumped. I followed this guide:http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/PHPDevelopmentHowTo/view?searchterm=apache%20php but i have nothing running on port 80
it doesn't have ID3 tag editing support [yet]
yes. it sucks
anyone wnat to help me get apache working?
chipzz: rythmnbox isn't a mp3player, it's a jukebox
You got any specific issues with apache, that you need help with.?
yes
i installed as per this guide: http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/PHPDevelopmentHowTo/view?searchterm=apache%20php but i have no apache running
i assumethere is a command i need to use?
hi
they are adding it in the next release, so noone cares
most people want one app to manage music
Ummm is apache running?
i don't know
i guess not. there is no apache or httpd in ps -A
whatever.. noone cares
the fact is they are putting it in and you can't stop them
right, sure, if i want to do mass tagging i'll open a tagging app
but if i just want to correct an mp3 while i'm in rythmbox, i just want to right click and fill it in
yes
but what is the problem with putting basic id3 tag support in ?
how do i start apache2?!
how do i start apache2?!
/etc/init.d/apache2 start
